alert.note: Alert for Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 11:27PM MDT until June 22 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Elbert County in east central Colorado... * Until midnight MDT. * At 1127 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Kiowa, or 32 miles west of Limon, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Elbert County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
